sentences.en: As they smiled at each other, harmony was restored again.
sentences.cn: 他们彼此微笑的时候，又恢复了往日的和睦。

sentences.en: Colors are in harmony.
sentences.cn: 色彩调和.

sentences.en: His ideas were no longer in harmony with ours.
sentences.cn: 他同我们的想法不再一致了.

sentences.en: I do believe it is possible for different ethnic groups to live together in harmony.
sentences.cn: 我确信不同民族的人民可以融洽相处。

sentences.en: In a beautiful picture there is harmony between the different colors.
sentences.cn: 美丽的画面中,不同色彩相协调.

sentences.en: Surely there is some way of ordering our busy lives so that we can live in comfort and find spiritual harmony too.
sentences.cn: 总会有办法能安排好我们忙碌的生活，这样就能过得舒服一点，同时还能达到内心的平静。

sentences.en: The couple lives in perfect harmony.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇和睦地生活着.

sentences.en: The harmony of sea and sky makes a beautiful picture.
sentences.cn: 海天一色构成一幅美丽的图画.

sentences.en: the need to be in harmony with our environment
sentences.cn: 同我们的环境协调的必要

sentences.en: The new agreement raised hopes for conditions of prosperity and harmony.
sentences.cn: 新的协议唤起了人们对繁荣与和谐前景的期望.

sentences.en: The rumpus has made all the optimistic statements about unity and harmony ring a little hollow.
sentences.cn: 这一番吵闹使得所有关于团结和谐的乐观言论听起来都显得有几分空洞。

sentences.en: The violin was out of harmony with the rest of the instruments.
sentences.cn: 小提琴拉得与其他乐器不谐调.

sentences.en: There was no love lost between the two men who were supposed to be working in harmony on a mounting crisis.
sentences.cn: 在一场日益严峻的危机面前，本应和睦共处、通力合作的这两个男人却势同水火。

sentences.en: There was perfect harmony between the two brothers.
sentences.cn: 兄弟俩的感情非常融洽.

sentences.en: They worked in perfect harmony.
sentences.cn: 他们合作无间.
